title: telegram-shill
author: telegram-shill
content: We built our own tool to scrape public Telegram Channels and Groups and send massive DMs to users.❗Search no more, you found quality crypto promotion service❗#telegram #dm #shill #shilling #massive #marketing #audience✅ Pricing$25 per 1,000 messages$100 per 5,000 messages$900 per 50,000 messagesWhat you will doYou will provide the list of the public Channels/Groups you want to scrape and send DM to(optionally, but recommended) You give us a profile picture, bio and description to put on the Telegram account used as senderSend the payment through MoneroWhat we will doFreshly scrape the Channels/Groups (usually takes 1-2 days max)Send a DM to all their users containing the message you wantFAQ1) Payment methods? Monero2) Refunds? No, we don't provide any refunds because we are fully confident in the service we provide⚡Get in touch with us, we will answer immediately: telegram-shill@proton.me
